mapper.insert: insert into recharge (id, login_name, amount, bank_code, status, source, channel, fast_pay, public_pay, created_time, updated_time, pay_type, bank_order_no, bank_order_date) value(#{id}, #{loginName}, #{amount}, #{bankCode}, #{status}, #{source}, #{channel}, #{fastPay}, #{publicPay}, #{createdTime}, now(), #{payType}, #{banOrderNo}, #{bankOrderDate})
mapper.update: update recharge set status = #{status}, updated_time = now() where id = #{id}
update recharge set status = #{status}, bank_order_no = #{bankOrderNo}, bank_order_date = #{bankOrderDate}, updated_time = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select IFNULL(sum(amount),0) as amount from recharge where status = 'SUCCESS' and login_name = #{loginName} and bank_code != 'ADMIN'
select distinct channel from recharge where channel is not NULL
